translation.en: Hello, my name is Detective Gil Carrillo,
translation.it: Sono il Detective Gil Carrillo,

translation.en: Los Angeles County Sheriff's Department, assigned to Homicide Bureau.
translation.it: della Sezione Omicidi del Dipartimento dello Sceriffo di L.A.

translation.en: The Sheriff's Department is conducting an investigation…
translation.it: Il Dipartimento sta conducendo un'indagine

translation.en: on a series of homicides and sexual assaults occurred in Los Angeles County.
translation.it: su una serie di omicidi e stupri nella contea di Los Angeles.

translation.en: The suspect, who has traveled highways in what we believe to be stolen vehicles,
translation.it: Il sospettato, che crediamo viaggi a bordo di veicoli rubati

translation.en: is always wearing gloves to make his entries.
translation.it: indossa i guanti quando entra nelle case.

translation.en: The suspect has used
translation.it: Il sospettato ha usato

translation.en: [echoing] guns, knives, tire irons, handcuffs and thumbcuffs,
translation.it: pistole, coltelli, cric, manette per polsi e per pollici,

translation.en: as well as his own foot, to inflict serious…
translation.it: nonché il suo stesso piede per colpire…

translation.en: Los Angeles City has almost all benefits and no negatives.
translation.it: Los Angeles City ha quasi solo pregi e nessun difetto.

translation.en: [woman 1] This was a decade when the queen visited, the Pope visited.
translation.it: In quel decennio ricevemmo visite dalla Regina e dal Papa.

translation.en: We had the Olympics.
translation.it: Ci furono le Olimpiadi.

translation.en: We were proud of the city, proud of LA.
translation.it: Eravamo orgogliosi di Los Angeles.

translation.en: For the first time in recorded history, our freeways were relatively clear.
translation.it: Per la prima volta nella storia, le autostrade erano sgombre.

translation.en: -[woman 1] It was a huge decade. -Crime dropped like a rock.
translation.it: - Un gran bel decennio. - La criminalità era colata a picco.

translation.en: [reporter] Our top story, record temperatures and fires scorching the Southland.
translation.it: Notizie del giorno: temperature record e incendi che bruciano il Sud.

translation.en: [reporter 2] Downtown the mercury reached 107 degrees this afternoon.
translation.it: Esatto, in centro la colonnina ha sfiorato i 42 gradi oggi.

translation.en: [woman 1] You have this amazing city, so many parallel universes.
translation.it: Avevi questa città meravigliosa, con tanti universi paralleli.

translation.en: [woman 2] LA was a facade.
translation.it: Los Angeles era una facciata.

translation.en: From one side, it was glamorous celebrities.
translation.it: Da un lato, il glamour, le celebrità.

translation.en: But if you went around to the other side…
translation.it: Ma se passavi dall'altra parte…

translation.en: …LA could be a very dark place.
translation.it: L.A. era un luogo pieno di ombre.

translation.en: [woman 2] You could be anybody.
translation.it: Potevi essere chiunque.

translation.en: It also attracted very, very dangerous people.
translation.it: Attirava anche persone molto pericolose.

translation.en: Nobody knows where this individual may strike next.
translation.it: Non si sa dove potrebbe colpire la prossima volta. SCERIFFO DI L.A.

translation.en: [reporter 3] The same man is suspected in six to eight murders and 25 to 30 attacks.
translation.it: Lo stesso uomo potrebbe aver commesso da 6 a 8 omicidi e da 25 a 30 aggressioni.

translation.en: There's sort of a thin line between
translation.it: C'è una linea sottile tra l'essere paranoici

translation.en: being paranoid about it and being aware of it.
translation.it: C'è una linea sottile tra l'essere paranoici e l'essere consapevoli.

translation.en: …the so-called Night Stalker who has terrorized California.
translation.it: …il Night Stalker, che ha terrorizzato la California.

translation.en: He struck again.
translation.it: Ieri ha colpito ancora.

translation.en: People wonder when and where he'll strike next.
translation.it: Ci si chiede quando e dove accadrà di nuovo.

translation.en: Everybody is scared.
translation.it: Abbiamo tutti paura.

translation.en: I am not leaving my door open for my son, I don't care if he sleeps on the street.
translation.it: Non lascio la porta aperta a mio figlio. Se dorme per strada, pazienza.

translation.en: [woman] I don't understand why somebody can't identify him.
translation.it: Non capisco perché non lo identifichino.

translation.en: He has to live somewhere. Somebody must know.
translation.it: Avrà una casa, qualcuno deve sapere.

translation.en: He's a weird-looking character. Somebody has to know him.
translation.it: È un personaggio strano. Qualcuno lo conoscerà!

translation.en: [Gil] I don't believe that anybody has a choice.
translation.it: Non credo nessuno abbia scelta.

translation.en: Your number is there one day. We're all going to die.
translation.it: Prima o poi tocca a tutti morire.

translation.en: We just don't know when.
translation.it: Solo non sappiamo quando.

translation.en: You start dying the day you were born.
translation.it: Inizi a morire il giorno in cui nasci.

translation.en: I was born and raised in the Catholic Church.
translation.it: Sono cresciuto con un'educazione cattolica.

translation.en: I believe in God. I believe in the Holy Spirit.
translation.it: Credo in Dio, credo nello Spirito Santo.

translation.en: I believe there's a devil. I believe there's an evil force.
translation.it: Credo che il diavolo e le forze del male esistano.

translation.en: I just say prayers, hopefully to help give me the wisdom and the knowledge
translation.it: Pregavo nella speranza di ottenere saggezza e conoscenza

translation.en: to bring this case to a solution.
translation.it: necessarie a risolvere il caso.

translation.en: All the people on the block that I lived on, were Mexicans.
translation.it: Tutti gli abitanti del mio quartiere erano messicani.

translation.en: There was a gang where I lived.
translation.it: Facevo parte di una gang.

translation.en: We all hung out on the corner of Dulin and Holbrook.
translation.it: Ci vedevamo tra la Dulin e la Holbrook.

translation.en: They were more important than school was to me,
translation.it: Per me erano più importanti della scuola,

translation.en: and I didn't realize that until a cop
translation.it: e non me ne accorsi finché un poliziotto non disse ai miei:

translation.en: told my mom and dad, "Sign for this young man to get off the street,
translation.it: e non me ne accorsi finché un poliziotto non disse ai miei: "Fatelo arruolare, o finirà morto o in carcere".

translation.en: or he'll end up dead or in prison."
translation.it: "Fatelo arruolare, o finirà morto o in carcere".

translation.en: And, so, at age 17, my parents signed for me to go into the Army.
translation.it: Così, all'età di 17 anni, i miei genitori firmarono per farmi entrare nell'esercito.

translation.en: I was a crew chief
translation.it: Ero capo equipaggio

translation.en: with 189th Assault Helicopter Company in Vietnam.
translation.it: della 189esima Compagnia di elicotteri d'assalto in Vietnam.

translation.en: I saw heavy, heavy combat.
translation.it: Ho visto combattimenti ad armamento pesante.

translation.en: By the grace of God, I made it out alive, and…
translation.it: Per grazia divina, portai a casa la pelle

translation.en: as soon as I got out of Armed Forces, I had three goals in life.
translation.it: e uscito dalle Forze Armate, avevo tre scopi nella vita.

translation.en: One was to start dating my former girlfriend,
translation.it: Uno era tornare insieme alla mia ex ragazza,

translation.en: who had dumped me while I was in Vietnam.
translation.it: che mi aveva lasciato mentre ero in Vietnam.

translation.en: I wanted to see if I could get her back, then break up with her.
translation.it: Volevo riconquistarla e poi lasciarla.

translation.en: I wanted revenge, I wanted to hurt her like she had hurt me.
translation.it: Volevo vendicarmi, ferirla come lei aveva ferito me.

translation.en: But it didn't work out that way. [laughs]
translation.it: Ma non andò in quel modo.

translation.en: [Pearl] He got out of the service in June,
translation.it: Lasciò le forze armate a giugno

translation.en: and we were married by December.
translation.it: e a dicembre eravamo sposati.

translation.en: [Gil] December 26, 1970.
translation.it: 26 dicembre 1970.

translation.en: That was goal number one. Goal number two was to go to college.
translation.it: Questo era il primo obiettivo. Il secondo era andare al college.

translation.en: Nobody in my family had ever gone to college,
translation.it: Nessuno in famiglia ci era mai andato

translation.en: and I thought college was for rich white people.
translation.it: e pensavo fosse una cosa per bianchi ricchi.

translation.en: So, I enrolled at Rio Hondo College…
translation.it: Così, mi iscrissi al Rio Hondo College

translation.en: and started going there.
translation.it: e iniziai a frequentarlo.

translation.en: Two out of three goals I accomplished.
translation.it: Quindi due obiettivi su tre raggiunti.

translation.en: And the third one was I wanted to become a cop.
translation.it: Il terzo era diventare poliziotto.

translation.en: October 1st, 1971…
translation.it: Primo ottobre 1971.

translation.en: I became a patrol cop at East LA Sheriff's Station.
translation.it: Diventai poliziotto di pattuglia della East LA Sheriff's Station.

translation.en: When I was 29 years of age, I got an outstanding evaluation.
translation.it: All'età di 29 anni ricevetti una valutazione eccellente.

translation.en: Those were hard to come by.
translation.it: Non capitava tutti i giorni.

translation.en: When I showed it to my mom and dad, my dad looked up and said…
translation.it: La mostrai ai miei, e mio padre mi guardò e disse:

translation.en: "I'm proud of you, son."
translation.it: "Sono fiero di te, figliolo".

translation.en: And he had never said that to me in my life.
translation.it: Non me l'aveva mai detto prima.

translation.en: He always wanted to make his dad proud. Proud of him.
translation.it: Ha sempre voluto che suo padre fosse orgoglioso di lui.

translation.en: [Gil] After that, I watched guys from homicide work.
translation.it: Osservavo sempre come lavoravano alla Omicidi.

translation.en: They were so meticulous, so good.
translation.it: Erano così meticolosi e bravi,

translation.en: When they pulled up on the scene, everybody got out of their way.
translation.it: e quando arrivavano sulla scena tutti facevano strada.

translation.en: "Wow, sheriff's homicide's here."
translation.it: "Wow, c'è la Omicidi dello Sceriffo."

translation.en: I told them, "One of these days, I want to do your job."
translation.it: Così dissi: "Un giorno voglio fare il vostro lavoro".

translation.en: March 23rd, 1981…
translation.it: 23 marzo 1981.

translation.en: I get called to go to Homicide Bureau.
translation.it: Mi trasferirono alla Sezione Omicidi.

translation.en: I only had nine and a half years experience.
translation.it: Solo nove anni e mezzo di esperienza.

translation.en: That was my goal, that was my dream, and… I made it.
translation.it: Era il mio obiettivo, il mio sogno, e ce l'avevo fatta.

translation.en: The Bulldogs. That was their nickname.
translation.it: Erano soprannominati i "bulldog".

translation.en: I covered hundreds of crimes and dozens and dozens of murders…
translation.it: Ho seguito centinaia di crimini e decine di omicidi…

translation.en: In downtown Los Angeles, Tony Valdez… [echoing] …Channel 11 News.
translation.it: Downtown Los Angeles, Tony Valdez, Channel 11 News.

translation.en: …and I can tell you there were a lot of murders that ended up being solved
translation.it: Vi assicuro che certi omicidi hanno finito per essere risolti

translation.en: 20 years later, because the Bulldogs never let go.
translation.it: vent'anni dopo, perché i bulldog non mollano mai.

translation.en: [Frank] We probably ran 350, 400 murders a year
translation.it: SEZIONE OMICIDI SCERIFFO DELLA CONTEA DI L.A. Lavoravamo a circa 350-400 omicidi all'anno

translation.en: for the sheriff's homicide bureau.
translation.it: alla Sezione Omicidi dello Sceriffo.

translation.en: Los Angeles Police Department was probably running 500 or 600.
translation.it: Il Dipartimento di polizia di L.A. ne gestiva tra 500 e 600.

translation.en: So, in LA County, there's probably close to 1,000 murders a year.
translation.it: Nella contea di Los Angeles, avvengono circa 1000 omicidi l'anno.

translation.en: And it takes a big ego, because you got to have confidence in what you're doing.
translation.it: È necessario un ego molto pronunciato e tanta fiducia in quello che fai.

translation.en: You're investigating the ultimate crime.
translation.it: Perché indaghi sul crimine per eccellenza.

translation.en: There's nothing more serious than one human being taking the life of another.
translation.it: Niente è più grave di un essere umano che priva un altro della vita.

translation.en: [Gil] Frank Salerno's the Italian Stallion, he's the goombah, he's… he's everything.
translation.it: Frank Salerno è lo stallone italiano, il "cumpà", è meraviglioso.

translation.en: When I got there, he was working on the Hillside Strangler.
translation.it: Quando arrivai, lavorava allo Strangolatore di Hillside.

translation.en: [reporter] This is where the first Hillside Strangler victim was found.
translation.it: Qui è stata trovata la prima vittima dello Strangolatore.

translation.en: The death of Laura Collins and 12 other young women
translation.it: La morte di Laura Collins e altre 12 donne

translation.en: touched off one of the largest manhunts in Southern California history.
translation.it: ha innescato una caccia all'uomo senza precedenti.

translation.en: [Gil] Everybody looked up to him. He's the man.
translation.it: Tutti lo ammiravano, era il migliore.

translation.en: [man] If you saw Frank Salerno or heard his name,
translation.it: Se vedevi Frank Salerno o lo sentivi nominare

translation.en: these were not small-time crimes.
translation.it: non erano certo reati minori.

translation.en: They were bringing heavy guns.
translation.it: PRODUTTORE KNBC NEWS Artiglieria pesante.

translation.en: Frank Salerno was a straight shooter. He's a disciplined guy.
translation.it: Frank Salerno era un uomo schietto e disciplinato.

translation.en: He was always a poker face.
translation.it: Aveva uno sguardo indecifrabile.

translation.en: He's very businesslike.
translation.it: Molto professionale.

translation.en: [reporter] His co-workers call him a cop's detective.
translation.it: I colleghi lo chiamano "detective della polizia".

translation.en: [man] Frank overlooks nothing.
translation.it: Frank non trascura nulla.

translation.en: You'd be surprised how thorough he is on an investigation.
translation.it: È impressionante quanto sia preciso nelle sue indagini.

translation.en: [Frank] Gil Carrillo and Jim Mercer were teamed together as partners.
translation.it: Gil Carrillo e Jim Mercer facevano coppia.

translation.en: He sat at a desk that was behind me and to my left.
translation.it: La sua scrivania era dietro di me a sinistra.

translation.en: And he was the youngest detective in the Bureau at the time.
translation.it: E all'epoca era il detective più giovane della Omicidi.

translation.en: One day, Frank comes over and says,
translation.it: Un giorno Frank mi fece:

translation.en: "Want to go down to Little Joe's?" An Italian restaurant in Chinatown.
translation.it: "Vuoi andare da Little Joe?", ristorante italiano a Chinatown.

translation.en: And I'm sitting there and I've never eaten Italian food.
translation.it: E così mi ritrovai lì, senza aver mai mangiato italiano.

translation.en: I grew up in a Mexican home. That's what I know, is Mexican food.
translation.it: Sono messicano e non conosco altra cucina.

translation.en: I look at this menu and I don't recognize anything.
translation.it: Guardavo il menù e non riconoscevo nulla.

translation.en: I don't know what it is. I remember ordering chicken Parmesan.
translation.it: Ricordo di aver ordinato pollo alla parmigiana.

translation.en: And I'm eating this food and I'm laughing.
translation.it: Mangiavo e ridevo.

translation.en: Salerno looked at me, said, "What's so funny, kid?" I said,
translation.it: Salerno mi guardò e mi disse: "Che hai da ridere?".

translation.en: "Here I am, last week, I'm eating a double-wrapped red chili burrito
translation.it: E io: "La settimana scorsa mangiavo un burrito doppio con peperoncino

translation.en: off the hood of a radio car in east LA.
translation.it: dal cofano di una volante a East L.A.

translation.en: Tonight, I'm wearing a suit and tie,
translation.it: Stasera sono in giacca e cravatta

translation.en: eating some shit that I don't know what it is, drinking a glass of wine
translation.it: a mangiare una schifezza di cui non so il nome e bere vino

translation.en: with Frank Salerno and the guys from Homicide.
translation.it: con Frank Salerno e la Omicidi.

translation.en: It don't get any better than that."
translation.it: Meglio di così, si muore".

translation.en: [woman] I was working at AT&T, and across the street was a mini-mall.
translation.it: Lavoravo alla At&T, proprio di fronte a un mini centro commerciale.

translation.en: And in there was a Salvation Army store.
translation.it: Dentro c'era un negozio dell'Esercito della Salvezza,

translation.en: And I would just spend my lunch hour in there.
translation.it: dove trascorrevo tutta la pausa pranzo.

translation.en: And once, I was in there,
translation.it: Una volta, ero lì dentro, c'era un tavolo

translation.en: there was a table that was full of junk,
translation.it: Una volta, ero lì dentro, c'era un tavolo pieno di cianfrusaglie, tra cui un cappello.

translation.en: and there was this hat.
translation.it: pieno di cianfrusaglie, tra cui un cappello.

translation.en: And I picked it up, 'cause the letters on it said "AC/DC."
translation.it: Così lo presi, e c'era scritto "AC/DC".

translation.en: I didn't know what that was, and thought it was kind of weird.
translation.it: Non sapevo cosa fosse, mi sembrò strano

translation.en: And so, I threw it back down.
translation.it: e così lo rimisi a posto.

translation.en: And then on my right, here comes this man,
translation.it: Poi sentii arrivare questo tizio alla mia destra,

translation.en: and he stood right there and picked up the hat…
translation.it: che mi venne vicino, prese il cappello,

translation.en: looked at it…
translation.it: lo guardò,

translation.en: turned around and looked at me,
translation.it: si voltò e mi guardò,

translation.en: and kind of smiled a little bit,
translation.it: mi fece un sorriso

translation.en: and he had the devil on his hand.
translation.it: e notai che aveva il diavolo tatuato sulla mano.

translation.en: A picture. A round circle with the face of the devil.
translation.it: Un cerchio col volto del diavolo.

translation.en: You know, with the horns?
translation.it: Anche con le corna.

translation.en: And he got the hat, walked away.
translation.it: Prese il cappello e se ne andò.

translation.en: When I went home from work,
translation.it: Quando tornai a casa dal lavoro,

translation.en: I was on the freeway with my little car,
translation.it: ero in autostrada con la mia macchina

translation.en: and here comes somebody speeding way behind me.
translation.it: quando sentii qualcuno accelerare dietro di me.

translation.en: Then all of a sudden, he just swerves around my car.
translation.it: E d'improvviso lo vidi sterzare,

translation.en: It's like he's right there.
translation.it: e fermarsi davanti a me.

translation.en: Like a moment, stop.
translation.it: Fu un attimo.

translation.en: And he turns and he just… He's looking at me.
translation.it: Si voltò, mi guardò,

translation.en: I remembered, you know, that was the same guy I saw at the thrift store.
translation.it: e mi resi conto che era lo stesso uomo che avevo visto al negozio.

translation.en: And he has this horrible big grin and he's missing all these teeth.
translation.it: Aveva un ghigno orribile, gli mancavano un sacco di denti.

translation.en: He just stared at me, like a weird smile.
translation.it: Mi fissava, con un sorriso sinistro.

translation.en: It was like a killer clown.
translation.it: Sembrava un pagliaccio assassino.

translation.en: [Gil] The date was March 17th, 1985, Saint Patrick's Day.
translation.it: Era il 17 marzo 1985, il giorno di San Patrizio.

translation.en: [Gil] I actually got that murder with my partner.
translation.it: Ci assegnarono quell'omicidio.

translation.en: I get there and the garage door is open.
translation.it: Quando arrivai, la porta del garage era aperta.

translation.en: In the garage, I see blood spatterings around the door and on the floor,
translation.it: Nel garage c'erano schizzi di sangue vicino alla porta e sul pavimento,

translation.en: right by the door that separates the garage from the condo proper.
translation.it: nei pressi della porta che separava il garage dal condominio.

translation.en: There was a baseball cap.
translation.it: E un cappellino da baseball.

translation.en: It said "AC/DC" on it.
translation.it: Con la scritta "AC/DC".

translation.en: And I go inside the condo…
translation.it: Così entrai nel condominio,

translation.en: walk around…
translation.it: feci un giro,

translation.en: and see a bloody phone inside the bedroom.
translation.it: e in camera da letto c'era un telefono tutto insanguinato.

translation.en: [Gil] And I see Dayle Okazaki lying on the kitchen floor…
translation.it: E poi vidi Dayle Okazaki distesa sul pavimento della cucina

translation.en: wearing a Dodger jersey.
translation.it: con una maglia dei Dodger.

translation.en: She had been shot right in the forehead.
translation.it: Le avevano sparato in fronte.

translation.en: She'd put her hands on the countertop, and lifted her head up
translation.it: Aveva messo le mani sul ripiano della cucina e alzato la testa

translation.en: because it was quiet in there, wanted to see where the suspect was at.
translation.it: perché c'era silenzio e voleva capire le intenzioni del killer.

translation.en: He was on the other side of the countertop waiting for her,
translation.it: Lui era dall'altra parte del ripiano che la aspettava

translation.en: knowing that she was going to pop her head up, 'cause he could see her hands,
translation.it: sapendo che avrebbe alzato la testa perché vedeva le mani.

translation.en: waiting there, and when she did, he pulled the trigger.
translation.it: Aveva aspettato, e poi premuto il grilletto.

translation.en: Maria Hernandez had just driven home.
translation.it: SOPRAVVISSUTA Maria Hernandez era appena rientrata.

translation.en: She entered via the garage door that she opened with a garage door opener, a remote.
translation.it: Era entrata dalla porta del garage, che aveva aperto col telecomando.

translation.en: Maria says she keyed the door when she heard an intentional noise.
translation.it: Maria aveva cercato di entrare dopo aver sentito un rumore intenzionale.

translation.en: She turned around and there was a male suspect with a stargazed look,
translation.it: Si era girata e aveva visto un uomo con lo sguardo perso,

translation.en: with a gun stretched out coming towards her face,
translation.it: che le puntava una pistola in faccia.

translation.en: and she put her hands up and he pulled the trigger.
translation.it: Aveva alzato le mani e lui aveva sparato.

translation.en: The bullet deflected off the keys in her hand.
translation.it: Il proiettile colpì le chiavi che aveva in mano

translation.en: It knocked her to the ground.
translation.it: e la fece cadere.

translation.en: He then pushed her body out of the way, entered the condo.
translation.it: Lui spostò il corpo per passare, entrò nel palazzo,

translation.en: She jumped up and started running down the alleyway
translation.it: lei si rialzò e cominciò a correre nel vicolo

translation.en: when she heard another gunshot.
translation.it: quando sentì un altro sparo.

translation.en: She became concerned for her roommate,
translation.it: Così, preoccupata per la coinquilina,

translation.en: so she went around the front of the condo
translation.it: corse all'ingresso principale del condominio

translation.en: thinking he'll come back out the garage door.
translation.it: pensando che lui sarebbe uscito dal garage.

translation.en: But he didn't.
translation.it: Ma non lo fece.

translation.en: He came out the front door.
translation.it: Uscì dalla porta sul davanti.

translation.en: He sees her. He's just as startled as she is to see him.
translation.it: Vedendola fu quasi più sorpreso di lei.

translation.en: Maria says, "I just threw my hands up and said, 'Hey, you already shot me once, do you really have to shoot me again?'"
translation.it: Maria disse: "Ehi, mi hai già sparato. Mi devi davvero sparare ancora?"

translation.en: At which time, the suspect puts the gun down by his side and doesn't even run.
translation.it: A quel punto, il sospettato abbassò l'arma e non corse neanche.

translation.en: He walks away.
translation.it: Andò via camminando.

translation.en: [Gil] I'm at the Maria Hernandez house.
translation.it: Ero a casa di Maria Hernandez e non pensavo ad altro

translation.en: I'm not thinking about anything else,
translation.it: Ero a casa di Maria Hernandez e non pensavo ad altro che a ricevere documentazioni precise sulle mie osservazioni.

translation.en: other than getting accurate documentations of what my observations are.
translation.it: che a ricevere documentazioni precise sulle mie osservazioni.

translation.en: So, I'm documenting everything from ambiance to smell,
translation.it: Stavo documentando tutto, dall'atmosfera all'odore

translation.en: using fixed objects to measure where her foot is, where her head is,
translation.it: usando oggetti fissi per misurare dov'erano il piede e la testa,

translation.en: directing the photographer to take photographs of the crime scene.
translation.it: e intanto davo indicazioni al fotografo che fotografava la scena del crimine.

translation.en: And once that's done,
translation.it: Una volta fatto quello,

translation.en: then I can start thinking about motives, and thinking about solving this case.
translation.it: potevo iniziare a pensare ai moventi e a risolvere il caso.

translation.en: I'm inside the living room and the deputy opens a door and says,
translation.it: Ero in soggiorno, quando un agente aprì la porta e fece:

translation.en: "Excuse me, the mother of Maria Hernandez is out here
translation.it: "Scusate, c'è la madre di Maria Hernandez

translation.en: and she'd like to have a word with you."
translation.it: e vorrebbe parlare con lei".

translation.en: While the door is open, he's standing there, I hear somebody say, "Gilbert, is that you?"
translation.it: La porta era aperta, e sentii dire: "Gilbert, sei tu?"

translation.en: I'm there saying, "Gilbert? Nobody calls me-- I'm Gil.
translation.it: Pensai: "Nessuno mi chiama Gilbert. Io sono Gil.

translation.en: I'm too cool to be Gilbert."
translation.it: Che noia il nome Gilbert.”

translation.en: And I can't see her, I hear her voice.
translation.it: E non la vedevo, sentivo solo la voce.

translation.en: And she says,
translation.it: Così mi fece:

translation.en: "It's me, Pauline."
translation.it: "Sono io, Pauline".

translation.en: And I said, "Pumpkin?"
translation.it: E io: "Zucca?"

translation.en: And she said, "Yes."
translation.it: E lei: "Sì".

translation.en: And it was the mother of Maria Hernandez.
translation.it: Era la madre di Maria Hernandez.

translation.en: A neighbor that lived three doors down from me when I was a kid growing up.
translation.it: Una vicina, che abitava tre case dopo la mia quando ero bambino.

translation.en: This case was already close to home.
translation.it: Il caso era già diventato personale.

translation.en: We find out the next day that 40 minutes after the murder of Dayle Okazaki,
translation.it: Il giorno dopo scoprimmo che 40 minuti dopo l'omicidio di Dayle Okazaki,

translation.en: the Monterey Park Police Department got a call.
translation.it: Monterey Park aveva avuto una segnalazione.

translation.en: There was a murder that had occurred probably a mile from where Dayle Okazaki got killed.
translation.it: C'era stato un altro omicidio a circa 1,5 km da quello di Dayle Okazaki.

translation.en: They've got a young Asian girl that is driving down the street,
translation.it: Una ragazza asiatica stava guidando

translation.en: and all of a sudden she is stopped,
translation.it: quando all'improvviso sarebbe stata fermata,

translation.en: and she's yanked out of her car,
translation.it: tirata fuori dall'auto,

translation.en: and she's shot for no apparent reason.
translation.it: e le avrebbero sparato senza motivo apparente.

translation.en: [reporter] Tsai-Lian Yu was left sprawled in the street, shot in the chest.
translation.it: Tsai-Lian Yu è stata lasciata distesa per strada, colpita al petto.

translation.en: Her last words:
translation.it: Le sue ultime parole, "Aiutatemi!"

translation.en: "Help me! Help me!"
translation.it: Le sue ultime parole, "Aiutatemi!" 30 ANNI

translation.en: [Gil] It was the same caliber weapon,
translation.it: L'arma era dello stesso calibro,

translation.en: but you can't assume that it's the same gun because…
translation.it: ma non si poteva supporre che fosse la stessa pistola

translation.en: …there are thousands upon thousands of .22s out there.
translation.it: perché in giro ci sono migliaia di calibro .22.

translation.en: Maybe it's not.
translation.it: Magari non lo era.

translation.en: So now we have Maria Hernandez in the hospital.
translation.it: Maria Hernandez era in ospedale.

translation.en: We told her we'd like to send the staff artist. She says, "Sure."
translation.it: Le chiedemmo se potesse fare un identikit e lei acconsentì.

translation.en: [Maria] I can tell you he was… 5'10", something like that. Dark clothes…
translation.it: Posso dirvi che era alto circa 1.80 m, abiti scuri…

translation.en: [Gil] When that staff artist brought me the picture,
translation.it: Il disegnatore mi portò lo schizzo,

translation.en: I was showing it to the detectives over at East LA Station, and a friend of mine said, "Gil, hold that thought."
translation.it: lo mostrai ai detective della East L.A. e un amico mi disse: "Aspetta un momento".

translation.en: He goes out to his car and he brings out an identikit drawing.
translation.it: Andò in macchina e mi mostrò un altro identikit.

translation.en: You put them together, it looks like the same guy.
translation.it: Confrontandoli sembrava lo stesso uomo.

translation.en: His drawing came from the physical description of a suspect
translation.it: Il suo disegno era la descrizione di un sospettato

translation.en: of an attempted kidnapping out of the city of Pico Rivera.
translation.it: di un tentativo di rapimento a Pico Rivera.

translation.en: My mind started working because,
translation.it: Così, misi in moto il cervello,

translation.en: before I got to Homicide, I was going to Cal State LA.
translation.it: perché prima della Omicidi, frequentavo la Cal State, L.A.

translation.en: There was a professor by the name of Robert Morneau.
translation.it: C'era un professore di nome Robert Morneau.

translation.en: Great man, best professor I've ever had.
translation.it: Il miglior professore che abbia mai avuto.

translation.en: And I took Advanced Criminal Investigation Pertaining to Sex Crimes from him.
translation.it: Avevo seguito i suoi corsi di Indagini avanzate sui reati sessuali.

translation.en: And I remembered that there's a deviancy that says,
translation.it: Così mi ricordai che una delle deviazioni recita:

translation.en: "I like to see a frightened look on your face."
translation.it: "Mi piace vedere il tuo sguardo spaventato.

translation.en: "I want to see you scared. That's what really gets me turned on."
translation.it: Voglio che tu abbia paura. È questo che mi eccita davvero."

translation.en: That's excitement to them.
translation.it: Per loro è eccitante.

translation.en: With Maria Hernandez,
translation.it: Con Maria Hernandez,

translation.en: he could have walked up behind her in silence and killed her.
translation.it: avrebbe potuto inseguirla in silenzio e ucciderla.

translation.en: He didn't.
translation.it: Non lo fece.

translation.en: He intentionally slapped the top of a car…
translation.it: Aveva scelto di battere sul tettuccio dell'auto

translation.en: -[slapping echoes] -…so she could turn around and see him.
translation.it: perché si voltasse e lo vedesse.

translation.en: Dayle Okazaki,
translation.it: Dayle Okazaki era a terra

translation.en: she was down on the ground and he waited until he saw the fear in her eyes,
translation.it: e lui aveva aspettato di leggerle il terrore negli occhi

translation.en: then he shot her right here.
translation.it: prima di spararle… qui.

translation.en: Tsai-Lian Yu,
translation.it: Tsai-Lian Yu.

translation.en: why wasn't she killed right there in the car?
translation.it: Perché non l'aveva uccisa in macchina?

translation.en: Whoever the suspect was wanted confrontation. Wanted to see that fear.
translation.it: Il sospettato cercava il confronto. Voleva vedere quella paura.

translation.en: That's what started me thinking about, perhaps, one man doing this.
translation.it: È questo che mi fece pensare che potesse essere lo stesso uomo.

translation.en: …with…
translation.it: con…

translation.en: And…
translation.it: Per questo…

translation.en: [Frank] Ten days after Okazaki, Hernandez, and Yu,
translation.it: Dieci giorni dopo Okazaki, Hernandez e Yu,

translation.en: there is a double murder out in Whittier County area.
translation.it: ci fu un doppio omicidio nella contea di Whittier.

translation.en: [Gil] The house of Vincent and Maxine Zazzara.
translation.it: La casa di Vincent e Maxine Zazzara.

translation.en: JD Smith and Russ Yuloth went to that case. It was their murder.
translation.it: Quell'omicidio andò a JD Smith e Russ Uloth.

translation.en: It's a pretty brutal murder.
translation.it: Omicidio piuttosto brutale.

translation.en: You could see where he stepped on a five-gallon plastic can
translation.it: Era salito su un contenitore di plastica da 4,5 litri

translation.en: and got in the house through an open restroom window.
translation.it: ed era entrato da una finestra del bagno aperta.

translation.en: The place was ransacked.
translation.it: In casa c'era il caos.

translation.en: [Frank] There was a $40,000 theft
translation.it: C'era stata una rapina da 40.000 dollari

translation.en: that occurred there in jewelry and things.
translation.it: in gioielli e altri oggetti di valore.

translation.en: The male is executed as he's sleeping on the couch…
translation.it: L'uomo era stato giustiziato mentre dormiva sul divano

translation.en: -[gunshot] -…with a gunshot wound to the temple.
translation.it: con un colpo alla tempia.

translation.en: A .22 was used.
translation.it: L'arma era una calibro .22.

translation.en: [Gil] So now you have Dayle Okazaki killed with a .22,
translation.it: Così, avevamo Dayle Okazaki uccisa con una calibro .22,

translation.en: Tsai-Lian Yu killed with a .22, and the Zazzaras killed with a .22.
translation.it: e Tsai-Lian Yu e i coniugi Zazzara, tutti uccisi con una calibro .22.

translation.en: [Frank] And the woman is found in bed.
translation.it: La donna si trovava a letto.

translation.en: [Gil] She has several stab wounds just above the vagina.
translation.it: Aveva diverse ferite da taglio appena sopra la vagina.

translation.en: She had been raped,
translation.it: Era stata stuprata

translation.en: and he actually cut her eyes out.
translation.it: e l'assassino le aveva cavato gli occhi.

translation.en: [Frank] Why?
translation.it: Perché?

translation.en: Why did he do that?
translation.it: Perché l'aveva fatto?

translation.en: Was it because she stared at him or got a hard look at him?
translation.it: Forse lei lo aveva fissato o guardato male?

translation.en: [Gil] He took the eyes with him, and then he's gone.
translation.it: Così le aveva rubato gli occhi e se n'era andato.

translation.en: [Frank] The biggest thing in that case was…
translation.it: La cosa più importante, in quel caso,

translation.en: a shoe print left at the point of entry and in flower beds around the house.
translation.it: fu un'impronta di scarpa trovata nel punto di ingresso e nelle aiuole.

translation.en: That was a full-sized 11 to 12 shoe.
translation.it: Era un'impronta di scarpa numero 44 e mezzo.

translation.en: [woman] I was six, and my first memory of that night is…
translation.it: Avevo sei anni e il primo ricordo che ho di quella notte

translation.en: the window opening and being woken up.
translation.it: è il rumore della finestra che si apre e che mi sveglia.

translation.en: And then being ushered out the window, and being carried.
translation.it: Poi ricordo di essere uscita dalla finestra e portata in braccio.

translation.en: It kind of hurts me to say that
translation.it: Mi fa male riconoscere che c'era una sorta di familiarità.

translation.en: there was a familiarity, uh…
translation.it: Mi fa male riconoscere che c'era una sorta di familiarità. SOPRAVVISSUTA AL NIGHT STALKER

translation.en: he reminded me of a family member,
translation.it: Mi ricordava un membro della famiglia

translation.en: and, you know, I was half asleep, I didn't know what was going on.
translation.it: e dato che ero mezza addormentata, non sapevo cosa succedesse,

translation.en: So, I thought, "Well, that's okay. I know him,
translation.it: pensavo: "È tutto a posto. Lo conosco.

translation.en: so… I guess this is okay that I'm going."
translation.it: pensavo: "È tutto a posto. Lo conosco. Posso andare con lui."

translation.en: I don't know how long I was in the car or what it looked like.
translation.it: Non ricordo quanto rimasi in macchina o come fosse.

translation.en: But I do remember
translation.it: Ma ricordo

translation.en: there was one point where we were driving,
translation.it: che a un certo punto mentre andavamo,

translation.en: and… he looked at me and,
translation.it: che a un certo punto mentre andavamo, lui mi guardò e mi disse:

translation.en: he said, you know,
translation.it: lui mi guardò e mi disse:

translation.en: "Open up the glove compartment."
translation.it: "Apri il cruscotto".

translation.en: And I did and there was a gun inside.
translation.it: Io lo feci, e dentro c'era una pistola.

translation.en: And he shut it and just kind of like-- "Just so you know, that's there."
translation.it: Poi lui lo richiuse, come a dire: "Sappi che è lì dentro".

translation.en: Things started from there.
translation.it: Cominciò tutto lì.

translation.en: You know…
translation.it: Insomma…

translation.en: Look at him and… touch him and things like that.
translation.it: Dovevo guardarlo, toccarlo, e cose così.

translation.en: And then we got to where we were going.
translation.it: E poi arrivammo a destinazione.

translation.en: I remember there being German Shepherds barking and a chain-link fence.
translation.it: Ricordo pastori tedeschi che abbaiavano e una recinzione.

translation.en: And he made me get into a zipped-up duffel bag
translation.it: Mi chiese di infilarmi in un borsone con la cerniera

translation.en: and he told me, "You need to be quiet.
translation.it: e mi disse: "Ora devi stare zitta.

translation.en: You need to get in here."
translation.it: Devi entrare qui dentro.

translation.en: Like, "Don't mess with me.
translation.it: Non farmi arrabbiare.

translation.en: Do what I say."
translation.it: Fai come ti dico."

translation.en: We had to walk through a room with a couch,
translation.it: Attraversammo una stanza con un divano,

translation.en: and everything was dark and kind of dingy.
translation.it: un posto buio e squallido.

translation.en: The windows were covered with drapery or something that made it dark, and…
translation.it: Alle finestre c'erano delle tende che facevano buio…

translation.en: I don't know. Just slimy.
translation.it: Insomma, squallore.

translation.en: Food packages and…
translation.it: Scatole vuote,

translation.en: take-out stuff around.
translation.it: cibo da asporto in giro.

translation.en: Very not my house.
translation.it: Molto diverso da casa mia.

translation.en: There was just this soundtrack of Madonna going on.
translation.it: La colonna sonora era di Madonna.

translation.en: [Anastasia] "Holiday" and "Like a Virgin."
translation.it: "Holiday" e "Like a virgin".

translation.en: All of those songs…
translation.it: Tutte quelle canzoni.

translation.en: …over and over.
translation.it: Senza pause.

translation.en: I remember saying, "Stop. This hurts. Don't."
translation.it: Ricordo di aver detto: "Basta, mi fai male".

translation.en: Or, like, "Why are you doing this?"
translation.it: Oppure: "Perché mi fai questo?"

translation.en: You know, I'd say, like, "Can I go to the bathroom?"
translation.it: Oppure: "Posso andare al bagno?"

translation.en: He would stop what he was doing, take me to the sink and sit me on the sink.
translation.it: Lui si fermava, mi portava al lavello e mi metteva seduta lì.

translation.en: And then nothing would happen for a while, then he'd take me back and… continue.
translation.it: Per un po' non succedeva nulla, ma poi mi riprendeva e continuava.

translation.en: And I would ask again, "I have to go to the bathroom. Can you please stop?" And he would keep stopping.
translation.it: E io dicevo che dovevo andare in bagno e lui si fermava.

translation.en: But, each time, it's like, "All right, I know you don't have to go."
translation.it: Ma ogni volta, mi faceva capire che lo sapeva che non dovevo andare.

translation.en: Something in the way that he would look at me that…
translation.it: C'era qualcosa nel modo in cui mi guardava

translation.en: It was almost like, "I'm sorry that I'm doing this to you.
translation.it: che indicava che gli dispiacesse farmi quello che mi faceva.

translation.en: But I'm not sorry, 'cause I'm not going to stop."
translation.it: Ma non abbastanza da fermarlo.

translation.en: He put me in the bag again, to leave the place where we were.
translation.it: Mi rimise nella borsa per andare via da quel posto.

translation.en: And after a while we stopped…
translation.it: E dopo un po' ci fermammo

translation.en: on the side of the road,
translation.it: sul ciglio della strada

translation.en: and he said, "There's a gas station over there.
translation.it: e mi disse: "Laggiù c'è un distributore.

translation.en: I want you to go in there and I want you to tell them to call 911
translation.it: Entra, chiedi che chiamino il 911

translation.en: and have them get your family to come get you."
translation.it: e fatti venire a prendere dai tuoi".

translation.en: Um, so…
translation.it: Così…

translation.en: he let me go.
translation.it: mi lasciò andare.

translation.en: [Frank] At that time there was a series of child abductions,
translation.it: All'epoca ci fu una serie di rapimenti,

translation.en: or attempted abductions, of children.
translation.it: o tentati rapimenti di bambini.

translation.en: In each case, the child was sexually assaulted.
translation.it: In ogni caso, il bambino è stato molestato.

translation.en: [reporter] February 25th, in Montebello,
translation.it: Il 25 febbraio, a Montebello,

translation.en: a six-year-old girl was taken from a schoolyard, molested, then abandoned.
translation.it: una bambina di sei anni è stata rapita da scuola, molestata e abbandonata.

translation.en: March 11th in Monterey Park,
translation.it: L'11 marzo a Monterey Park,

translation.en: a nine-year-old boy was snatched from his bed, molested, then abandoned.
translation.it: un bambino di nove anni rapito dal suo letto, molestato e abbandonato.

translation.en: March 20th, in Glassell Park,
translation.it: Il 20 marzo, a Glassell Park,

translation.en: an eight-year-old girl was taken from her bed, assaulted in a car, then abandoned.
translation.it: una bambina di 8 anni è stata rapita, molestata in auto e abbandonata.

translation.en: [Gil] If kids get sexually assaulted, get kidnapped, or anything happens to kids,
translation.it: Se i bambini vengono violentati, rapiti o qualsiasi cosa,

translation.en: that's an entirely different unit.
translation.it: se ne occupa un'unità diversa.

translation.en: I was assigned to the sheriff's Homicide Bureau.
translation.it: Io ero nella Omicidi dello Sceriffo.

translation.en: I'm working one murder…
translation.it: Lavoravo a un omicidio,

translation.en: the murder of Dayle Okazaki and the wounding of Maria Hernandez.
translation.it: quello di Dayle Okazaki, e il ferimento di Maria Hernandez.

translation.en: And as part of your investigation, you look for broadcast.
translation.it: Mentre porti avanti delle indagini tutto può essere interessante.

translation.en: Everything else that's going on around in the area, what's happening.
translation.it: Per esempio qualsiasi cosa accada nella zona dell'omicidio.

translation.en: The first description I got was from Maria Hernandez.
translation.it: Il primo identikit fu quello di Maria Hernandez.

translation.en: When you look at the reports that the children gave… their descriptions were very similar.
translation.it: Osservando le descrizioni dei bambini, si notavano parecchie somiglianze.

translation.en: They described him as being tall, thin, light-skinned Hispanic or Caucasian,
translation.it: Lo descrivevano alto, magro, ispanico dalla carnagione chiara o bianco,

translation.en: disheveled hair,
translation.it: capelli arruffati,

translation.en: all black clothing, Members Only-type jacket,
translation.it: vestito di nero, giubbotto della Members Only,

translation.en: brown-stained gap teeth, and a pungent odor.
translation.it: denti macchiati di scuro e maleodorante.

translation.en: In my opinion, we had a serial killer that was responsible for kidnapping children,
translation.it: Secondo me, avevamo un serial killer responsabile anche di rapimento di minori,

translation.en: girls, boys, raping adult women, killing adult women, killing males.
translation.it: stupro di donne adulte, e omicidio di uomini e donne adulti.

translation.en: Not many people believed that,
translation.it: Non erano in tanti a credermi.

translation.en: because we've never encountered anybody like that…
translation.it: Non erano in tanti a credermi. Non c'era mai stato un sospettato cosi nella storia del crimine.

translation.en: in criminal history.
translation.it: Non c'era mai stato un sospettato cosi nella storia del crimine.

translation.en: [Frank] Gil asked me, "What do you think?"
translation.it: Gil mi chiese: "Cosa ne pensi?"

translation.en: I said, "Is it possible? Absolutely.
translation.it: E io gli risposi: "Se è possibile? Certo che lo è.

translation.en: Is it probable? Mmm.
translation.it: È probabile?

translation.en: It's never been documented before."
translation.it: Non ci sono precedenti".

translation.en: [Gil] On April 10th,
translation.it: Il 10 aprile,

translation.en: I attended a meeting of local law enforcement from the Los Angeles area
translation.it: partecipai a una riunione di tutte le forze dell'ordine di L.A.

translation.en: to exchange information between agencies on the abduction of children.
translation.it: per scambiarci informazioni sul rapimento di bambini.

translation.en: I was alleging that the child abductions were related to the homicides.
translation.it: Io sostenevo che i rapimenti erano legati agli omicidi.

translation.en: And they were laughing at me.
translation.it: E tutti ridevano di me.

translation.en: [Frank] This just doesn't occur.
translation.it: Era improbabile.

translation.en: You didn't have a guy going around violently killing people
translation.it: Chi è che commette omicidi sanguinosi

translation.en: and then also kidnapping and assaulting young people
translation.it: e allo stesso tempo rapimenti e stupri di ragazzini

translation.en: and allowing them to live.
translation.it: per poi rilasciarli?

translation.en: It's unheard of.
translation.it: Mai sentito.

translation.en: And these old-timers, they laughed it off.
translation.it: La vecchia guardia gli rise in faccia.

translation.en: I went there openly and honestly.
translation.it: Parlai apertamente e con sincerità.

translation.en: I didn't realize that they were going to reject… and scoff at my theory.
translation.it: Non pensai che avrebbero rifiutato e deriso la mia teoria.

translation.en: Gil was very frustrated with the way he was being treated.
translation.it: Gil era molto frustrato per come venne trattato.

translation.en: [Gil] I had an inside friend that worked Monterey Park that told me,
translation.it: Un collega e amico a Monterey Park mi disse:

translation.en: "Every time you walk out of this office, every time you come in, walk out,
translation.it: "Ogni volta che metti piede in questo ufficio

translation.en: they're motherfucking you to death, thinking you're a young punk
translation.it: tutti ti prendono in giro, e dicono che sei un pivello che vuole mettersi in mostra".

translation.en: trying to make a name for myself."
translation.it: e dicono che sei un pivello che vuole mettersi in mostra".

translation.en: I thought Gil was right in suggesting that it was one person.
translation.it: Pensavo che Gil avesse ragione a dire che fosse la stessa persona.

translation.en: He had a good sense of this killer.
translation.it: Aveva un buon istinto per questo assassino.

translation.en: So, I just encouraged him, as his friend, and said, "Go for it."
translation.it: Quindi da amica, lo incoraggiai e gli dissi di provarci.

translation.en: [Gil] I used to use East LA Patrol Station as kind of like my home base.
translation.it: Usavo la stazione di East L.A. come base.

translation.en: Deputies there were well aware of what I was working.
translation.it: Gli agenti sapevano a cosa lavoravo.

translation.en: A deputy from the station approached me and said, "Some girls called the cops.
translation.it: Uno di loro venne da me e mi disse: "Delle ragazze hanno chiamato la polizia

translation.en: They said, "This guy was following us. Here's his plate number.'"
translation.it: dicendo che un tizio li seguiva. Ecco la targa".

translation.en: The guy had long hair, was tall, light-skinned Mexican.
translation.it: Messicano dalla carnagione chiara, alto, capelli lunghi.

translation.en: I got a surveillance team and they're following him
translation.it: Così lo feci seguire da una squadra,

translation.en: and he went to a restaurant.
translation.it: lui andò in un ristorante,

translation.en: And they said he drove around the parking lot
translation.it: poi fece il giro del parcheggio,

translation.en: and just kept skulking around, and finally saw a lone female
translation.it: continuò a vagare senza meta finché non vide una donna sola

translation.en: and he started following her.
translation.it: e iniziò a seguirla.

translation.en: She realizes she's being followed, so she splits and she gets away from him.
translation.it: Lei capì che qualcuno la seguiva, cambiò strada e lo seminò.

translation.en: And they're still on him. They said, "This guy's a freak!"
translation.it: Loro continuarono a seguirlo pensando fosse un maniaco.

translation.en: If he sees any female,
translation.it: Bastava che vedesse una donna qualsiasi,

translation.en: didn't matter, guy went through all kinds of traffic just to get to 'em.
translation.it: Bastava che vedesse una donna qualsiasi, ignorava il traffico solo per raggiungerla.

translation.en: And so, we take Arturo Robles into custody… and I talked to him.
translation.it: E così arrestammo Arturo Robles, e ci parlai io.

translation.en: And I said, "You're making U-turns because you wanna get to a woman?"
translation.it: E gli dissi: "Torni indietro ogni volta che vedi una donna?"

translation.en: He said, "Yeah, I like women. Nothing wrong with that."
translation.it: E lui: "Sì, mi piacciono. Non c'è niente di male".

translation.en: I said, "Lady walks by you, then you ducked down behind the car."
translation.it: Io risposi: "Una ti è passata vicino e tu ti sei nascosto dietro l'auto".

translation.en: He says, "Oh, I didn't duck. My shoes were untied."
translation.it: E lui: "Mi allacciavo le scarpe".

translation.en: He had an answer for everything. He was good.
translation.it: Aveva una risposta per tutto. Era bravo.

translation.en: And so I put a six-pack, a mug show folder together. One of the people I showed it to was Maria Hernandez.
translation.it: Così misi insieme sei foto segnaletiche e le mostrai anche a Maria Hernandez.

translation.en: And she said, "That could be him."
translation.it: Lei disse: "Potrebbe essere quello".

translation.en: And so, we go back, write a search warrant,
translation.it: Così ottenemmo un mandato di perquisizione,

translation.en: go down to his house,
translation.it: andammo a casa sua,

translation.en: we find all kinds of pictures out of magazines,
translation.it: e trovammo ritagli di riviste di tutti i tipi,

translation.en: photographs of women.
translation.it: con foto di donne.

translation.en: Wearing a black Members Only jacket, he's got dark clothing.
translation.it: Aveva un giubbotto nero Members Only e abiti scuri.

translation.en: He's got ladies' underwear, and they're all sliced in the crotch.
translation.it: Trovammo mutandine da donna, tutte tagliate al cavallo.

translation.en: So, we had a lineup and nobody could pick him in the lineup.
translation.it: Ma al confronto all'americana nessuno lo riconobbe.

translation.en: Not even Maria Hernandez.
translation.it: Neanche Maria Hernandez.

translation.en: My partner looked at me and said,
translation.it: Il mio partner mi guardò e disse:

translation.en: "He's a freak.
translation.it: "È uno spostato.

translation.en: But he's not your freak.
translation.it: Ma non il tuo spostato.

translation.en: He's not the guy."
translation.it: Non è lui".

translation.en: [Linda] In the case of the Dois in Monterey Park, I was called to go to their home.
translation.it: Per il caso dei Doi a Monterey Park, mi convocarono presso l'abitazione.

translation.en: So, when I arrived at the scene,
translation.it: Così, quando arrivai sulla scena,

translation.en: it was really violent…
translation.it: lo spettacolo era atroce,

translation.en: and destructive.
translation.it: distruttivo.

translation.en: [reporter] Authorities say that the man shot 66-year-old William Doi,
translation.it: Ci è stato riferito che l'uomo ha sparato a William Doi, 66 anni,

translation.en: then raped, beat and robbed his wife.
translation.it: per poi stuprare, picchiare e rapinare la moglie.

translation.en: Detectives say Doi saved his wife's life by calling 911 before he died.
translation.it: I detective dicono che Doi ha salvato la vita della moglie chiamando il 911.

translation.en: [Tony] They found his wife badly beaten.
translation.it: 66 ANNI La moglie era stata picchiata.

translation.en: On the thumb of her left hand, she was wearing thumbcuffs…
translation.it: Al pollice sinistro aveva delle manette per pollici…

translation.en: Eighteen years I worked homicide,
translation.it: In diciotto anni alla Omicidi

translation.en: it's the only case I ever came across where thumbcuffs were used.
translation.it: è l'unico caso in cui ho incontrato questo strumento.

translation.en: [Tony] A bizarre restraining device,
translation.it: Un bizzarro strumento di tortura,

translation.en: the thumb of her right hand was bleeding profusely,
translation.it: il pollice della mano destra sanguinava copiosamente,

translation.en: indicating that in her attempt to free herself Mrs. Doi had ripped her thumbs apart.
translation.it: indicando che nel tentativo di liberarsi, la Doi si era strappata i pollici.

translation.en: And that's basically the information we get from the Doi murder.
translation.it: Questo è più o meno ciò che sapevamo sull'omicidio dei Doi.

translation.en: We had…
translation.it: Avevamo…

translation.en: We had nothing. [chuckles] We had a whodunit.
translation.it: Nulla, avevamo. Una storia da libro giallo.

translation.en: [Gil] A friend from Montebello PD says, "I may have found a link that's gonna help you link these cases."
translation.it: Un amico della polizia di Montebello mi disse che forse aveva un collegamento.

translation.en: And he showed me a picture of a footprint that was taken at a child abduction.
translation.it: E mi mostrò una foto di un'impronta dalla scena di un rapimento.

translation.en: [Frank] She was eight years old and taken from her house,
translation.it: Aveva otto anni, era stata rapita da casa sua,

translation.en: taken to a construction site and was sexually assaulted,
translation.it: portata in un cantiere edile, violentata,

translation.en: and then set free.
translation.it: e poi liberata.

translation.en: At that construction site, they had poured concrete that day
translation.it: Nel cantiere avevano posato il cemento proprio quel giorno

translation.en: and there was a shoe print in the concrete.
translation.it: e per questo c'era un'impronta.

translation.en: And so I went down there. He showed them. I said, "Jesus Christ."
translation.it: Così andai là e gliela mostrai. Dissi: "Porca miseria".

translation.en: And I recognized it immediately
translation.it: La riconobbi immediatamente come la stessa o una quasi identica

translation.en: as the same or similar footprint that was lifted
translation.it: La riconobbi immediatamente come la stessa o una quasi identica a quella della scena dell'omicidio degli Zazzara.

translation.en: at the Zazzara homicide crime scene.
translation.it: a quella della scena dell'omicidio degli Zazzara.

translation.en: [Frank] We knew by Zazzara, we were looking for a pretty good-sized shoe.
translation.it: Sapevamo, dalla scena degli Zazzara, che era una scarpa piuttosto grande.

translation.en: Somewhere between 11 and a 12.
translation.it: Tra il 44 e il 45.

translation.en: So, I called up my lieutenant and I said, "Okay, I found the link."
translation.it: Chiamai il tenente e gli dissi: "Ho il collegamento".

translation.en: And he says, "Gil, I've got the guys from LAPD in here that are handling that case,
translation.it: E lui mi rispose: "Gil, gli agenti della polizia di Los Angeles sul caso

translation.en: they're looking for a size ten.
translation.it: stanno cercando un 41.

translation.en: You're looking for a bigger shoe."
translation.it: La tua scarpa è più grande".

translation.en: I said, "Put them on the phone."
translation.it: Gli dissi: "Passameli".

translation.en: And he got on the phone. I said, "I wanna know how you determine your size,
translation.it: Così dissi: "Scusate. Come li misurate i numeri di scarpa?

translation.en: because I'm looking at a shoe that's a one-to-one with a ruler in it.
translation.it: Perché io ci ho messo il righello di fianco.

translation.en: It's 12 inches long. How do you get a size 10?"
translation.it: Sono 30 cm di impronta. Come fa a essere un 41?"

translation.en: All they did, because the cement was kind of wet,
translation.it: Loro, poiché il cemento era bagnato,

translation.en: was he put his shoe, he wore wingtips, size 10,
translation.it: avevano preso una delle loro scarpe di pelle coi lacci, numero 41,

translation.en: and he stood on one foot and put his wingtip down over the shoe print,
translation.it: e uno di loro si era messo su una gamba sopra all'impronta

translation.en: and he says, "My shoe covers it. Got to be a size 10."
translation.it: pensando: "Ok, la mia la copre, quindi deve essere un 41."

translation.en: Says, "I obviously made a mistake, I got to change it. I got to make it right. You're right."
translation.it: E poi disse: "È ovvio che ho sbagliato. Ora devo rimediare".

translation.en: Now I've got a little bit of circumstantial evidence here.
translation.it: Finalmente avevo prove circostanziali.

translation.en: But that still wasn't enough.
translation.it: Ma non bastavano.

translation.en: [Frank] In May, 1985,
translation.it: Nel maggio del 1985,

translation.en: Gil loses his partner.
translation.it: Gil perse l'agente con cui lavorava.

translation.en: My partner goes off, eventually, to retire.
translation.it: Il mio era andato in pensione

translation.en: So, we decided to hook up.
translation.it: e così decidemmo di fare coppia.

translation.en: Both get a drink at the bar and he says,
translation.it: Eravamo al bar a bere e mi fece:

translation.en: "Gil, would you be interested in working with me?"
translation.it: "Gil, ti andrebbe di lavorare con me?"

translation.en: "Too Cool Carrillo," you know, so I said, "Yeah, I'll give it some thought."
translation.it: Così, Carrillo Superstar rispose: "Ok, ci penso su".

translation.en: I went back and sat next to my wife and said,
translation.it: Tornai a casa da mia moglie e le dissi:

translation.en: "Frank Salerno just asked me to be his partner!"
translation.it: "Frank Salerno mi ha chiesto di fare coppia con lui".

translation.en: He goes, "Frank Salerno! He's the best up there!"
translation.it: "Frank Salerno è il migliore!"

translation.en: [Frank] Gil was young,
translation.it: Gil era giovane,

translation.en: enthusiastic,
translation.it: entusiasta,

translation.en: had a good reputation,
translation.it: aveva una buona reputazione,

translation.en: and spoke Spanish,
translation.it: parlava spagnolo,

translation.en: and I thought we'd make a good team.
translation.it: e pensai che saremmo stati un'ottima squadra.

translation.en: [Gil] Next day he comes up to me and he says,"I was in my cups that night."
translation.it: Il giorno dopo venne da me e mi disse: "Ieri sera ero brillo".

translation.en: And I figure… Frank's letting me down easy.
translation.it: Pensai che mi stesse scaricando con gentilezza.

translation.en: He says, "Yeah, but I'm not in my cups now. I'm asking you, are you still interested?"
translation.it: Disse: "Ma ora non lo sono più. Sei ancora interessato?"

translation.en: And I said, "Sure."
translation.it: E io risposi: "Certo".

translation.en: He says, "Good, I went to the captain. It's gonna happen."
translation.it: E lui: "Bene, l'ho già detto al capitano".

translation.en: I said, "Cool."
translation.it: E io: "Perfetto".

translation.en: [Frank] Gil and I team up.
translation.it: Io e Gil lavoravamo insieme.

translation.en: We become partners.
translation.it: Facevamo coppia.

translation.en: I was really surprised, in a way, when I first realized that Frank Salerno,
translation.it: Rimasi molto sorpreso quando mi resi conto che Frank Salerno,

translation.en: the almost bigger-than-life…
translation.it: una vera e propria leggenda

translation.en: murder cop,
translation.it: della Omicidi,

translation.en: and then,
translation.it: faceva coppia…

translation.en: here's this guy, Gil Carrillo.
translation.it: con un certo Gil Carrillo.

translation.en: I knew him from the streets.
translation.it: Lo conoscevo dalla strada.

translation.en: When he was a patrol deputy, he was known as El Cucuy,
translation.it: Un agente di pattuglia che chiamavano El Cucuy,

translation.en: the boogeyman.
translation.it: l'uomo nero.

translation.en: He was notorious for eating sunflower seeds
translation.it: Era famoso perché mangiava i semi di girasole

translation.en: and spitting the shells out all over the place.
translation.it: e sputava le bucce ovunque.

translation.en: Figuring out how he ends up working with Frank Salerno.
translation.it: Non capivo cosa ci facesse con Frank Salerno.

translation.en: They were an odd couple.
translation.it: Erano una strana coppia.

translation.en: Frank was all business, no smiles.
translation.it: Frank era tutto lavoro, niente sorrisi.

translation.en: And Gil was this big guy who was, you know, jovial.
translation.it: E Gil era un omone gioviale.

translation.en: Gil was a welcome relief. [laughs]
translation.it: Gil fu un sollievo per noi.

translation.en: [Gil] He could've had anybody he wanted as a partner.
translation.it: Avrebbe potuto scegliere chiunque.

translation.en: And he asked me and I was tickled pink. I was flying.
translation.it: Ma scelse me e io ero al settimo cielo.

translation.en: [Gil] Patty Elaine Higgins was killed in the city of Arcadia.
translation.it: Patty Elaine Higgins fu uccisa nella città di Arcadia.

translation.en: That's the first case Frank and I had had together.
translation.it: Fu il primo caso a cui lavorammo insieme.

translation.en: [Frank] The killer was very enraged.
translation.it: L'assassino era rabbioso.

translation.en: He viciously cut her throat, then he stabbed her in that slash.
translation.it: Il modo in cui le aveva tagliato la gola e l'aveva pugnalata…

translation.en: Like, you know, here's some more.
translation.it: Tipo: "Non ho finito con te!"

translation.en: That's a very violent individual.
translation.it: Un individuo estremamente violento.

translation.en: Four days go by…
translation.it: Quattro giorni dopo…

translation.en: …and Arcadia PD calls the bureau again, says, "We've got another murder."
translation.it: …la polizia di Arcadia ci richiamò dicendo: "Abbiamo un altro omicidio".

translation.en: So, Gil and I roll out to the Cannon case,
translation.it: E così, io e Gil andammo a seguire il caso Cannon,

translation.en: just a few miles from where Patty Higgins' case was.
translation.it: pochi chilometri dalla scena di Patty Higgins.

translation.en: [Gil] She had her throat slit,
translation.it: Le avevano tagliato la gola

translation.en: very similar to the way Patty Elaine Higgins' throat had been slit
translation.it: in modo molto simile all'omicidio di Patty Elaine Higgins

translation.en: four days prior.
translation.it: quattro giorni prima.

translation.en: Then we get to the 5th of July, three days later.
translation.it: E poi arrivammo al 5 luglio, tre giorni dopo.

translation.en: [Frank] We get a call from Sierra Madre PD, which is not too far from Arcadia right there.
translation.it: Ricevemmo una chiamata dalla polizia di Sierra Madre, non lontano da Arcadia.

translation.en: In the front of the house there is a fabric mark and blood… on the windowsill,
translation.it: Davanti alla casa c'erano pezzi di stoffa e del sangue sul davanzale.

translation.en: so we knew that the suspect was wearing,
translation.it: Quindi sapevamo che il sospettato indossava

translation.en: like, a gardener's glove or something like that.
translation.it: un guanto da giardiniere o qualcosa di simile.

translation.en: And we never find a single fingerprint
translation.it: Non abbiamo mai trovato neanche un'impronta digitale

translation.en: in any of our crime scenes.
translation.it: in nessuna delle scene.

translation.en: [reporter] She was beaten with a tire iron at her parents' home in Sierra Madre.
translation.it: È stata picchiata con un cric in casa dei genitori a Sierra Madre.

translation.en: [Frank] The room was ransacked.
translation.it: La camera era devastata.

translation.en: I mean, just ransacked.
translation.it: Veramente devastata.

translation.en: [reporter] She says she remembers only going to bed.
translation.it: Dice di ricordare solo di essere andata a letto.

translation.en: She woke up bloodied, beaten, her bedroom in a disarray.
translation.it: Si è svegliata insanguinata, malmenata, e con la camera distrutta.

translation.en: She ended up with 42 inches of lacerations and skull fractures.
translation.it: Sul corpo aveva più di un metro di lacerazioni, più fratture craniche.

translation.en: It's a difficult situation to…
translation.it: È davvero difficile…

translation.en: stand there and interview a 16-year-old that had just gone through this.
translation.it: interrogare una sedicenne che ha appena vissuto una cosa del genere.

translation.en: And you wanna…
translation.it: Vuoi solo…

translation.en: You really want to get your hands on that individual.
translation.it: mettere le mani su quell'individuo.

translation.en: [Gil] We didn't go in the room where this happened,
translation.it: In camera non entrammo proprio.

translation.en: we didn't want to contaminate it.
translation.it: Non volevamo contaminare la scena.

translation.en: We're waiting out in the living room when Gisele Lavigne,
translation.it: Eravamo nel soggiorno, quando uscì Gisele Lavigne,

translation.en: who was a criminalist from our crime lab,
translation.it: un tecnico del nostro laboratorio della Scientifica.

translation.en: she walks out, she's wearing a lab coat, her hair's in a bun, glasses on,
translation.it: un tecnico del nostro laboratorio della Scientifica. Aveva il camice, i capelli raccolti, gli occhiali,

translation.en: and she says, "Hey, fellas,
translation.it: e ci disse: "Ehi, ragazzi.

translation.en: found something, may be interesting. You oughta take a look."
translation.it: Ho trovato qualcosa di interessante. Guardate".

translation.en: She's got a pink comforter in her hand,
translation.it: Aveva in mano un piumone rosa,

translation.en: and she walks out to us and she opens it up
translation.it: venne verso di noi, lo aprì,

translation.en: and there's a shoe print in blood on that comforter.
translation.it: e c'era un'impronta insanguinata di una scarpa sul piumone.

translation.en: [Gil] And that was the same footprint that was at the Zazzara murder,
translation.it: Era la stessa impronta rinvenuta sulla scena degli Zazzara

translation.en: and it is the same footprint found at the northeast abduction of a 10-year-old little girl.
translation.it: e la stessa impronta del rapimento della bambina di dieci anni.

translation.en: That's a serial-- There's no doubt in my mind. It's the same guy.
translation.it: Era un seriale. Non avevo alcun dubbio. Era lo stesso uomo.

translation.en: Gil and I just looked at each other. It's like, "Wow."
translation.it: Gil e io ci guardammo e pensammo: "Wow".

translation.en: The only thing I could say was, "Kiss my ass."
translation.it: L'unica cosa che dissi fu: "Baciami il culo!"

translation.en: And Frank said, "Yeah, kiss your ass."
translation.it: E Frank rispose: "Sì, ti bacio il culo".

translation.en: It gave me chills, like it's giving me right now.
translation.it: Mi vennero i brividi, ce li ho anche ora.

translation.en: Right after we saw the footprint,
translation.it: Dopo aver visto l'impronta,

translation.en: Frank says, "Okay. Tell me everything you've got in your head."
translation.it: Frank disse: "Dimmi cosa ti passa per la testa".

translation.en: William and Emily Doi.
translation.it: William ed Emily Doi.

translation.en: We have Patty Elaine Higgins, we have Mary Cannon, and now Whitney Bennett.
translation.it: Avevamo Patty Elaine Higgins, Mary Cannon e ora Whitney Bennett.

translation.en: They weren't all my cases, but I studied them. I knew all the details,
translation.it: Non erano tutti miei, ma li avevo studiati e li sapevo a memoria i casi.

translation.en: times, addresses, information, and I told him everything.
translation.it: Orari, indirizzi, informazioni. Gli dissi tutto.

translation.en: Now it's in black and white in front of you.
translation.it: Era tutto lì, nero su bianco.

translation.en: There's no denying it.
translation.it: Non c'era più alcun dubbio.

translation.en: Gil was right.
translation.it: Gil aveva ragione.

translation.en: The Bureau didn't think it was one man, but once Frank got on board,
translation.it: La Omicidi non ci credeva, ma quando Frank si convinse che era un uomo solo, tutti lo seguirono.

translation.en: said, "Yes, it's one man," everybody listens.
translation.it: ma quando Frank si convinse che era un uomo solo, tutti lo seguirono.

translation.en: Picked up the phone called the captain right away.
translation.it: Prese il telefono e chiamò il capitano.

translation.en: He said, "Okay, let's… let's go at it."
translation.it: Lui disse: "Ok, procediamo".

translation.en: And things started going fast and furious.
translation.it: Le cose iniziarono ad andare velocissime.

translation.en: We got a hell of a series going here.
translation.it: Avevamo una serie pazzesca di crimini.

translation.en: We got us a serial killer.
translation.it: Avevamo un serial killer.
